author: AntumDeluge
long_description:
### Description:

A mod that allows players to create a limited number of personal bookmarks to where they can teleport.

### Licensing:

- Code: [MIT](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-pbmarks/blob/master/LICENSE.txt)
- Textures: CC0
- Icon: [CC0](https://openclipart.org/detail/266815)

### Usage:

```
Show formspec:
- sfinv
	- open inventory
	- select "More" tab
	- press "Personal Bookmarks" button
- unified_inventory & i3
	- open inventory
	- select "Personal Bookmarks" tab
- chat command
	/pbmarks

Set bookmark:
- input label into a text field
- press "Set" button associated with label to store current location

Teleport:
- press "Go" button associated with label to teleport to stored location

Unset bookmark:
- clear label text field
- press "Set" button associated with label to unset bookmark
```

### Links:

- [Reference](https://antummt.github.io/mod-pbmarks/docs/api.html)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-pbmarks/blob/master/changelog.txt)

name: pbmarks

title: Personal Bookmarks
